languages.text: Лорд-командор, мы зафиксировали благословенное сияние {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Астрономикона{/g} и готовы совершить первый варп-прыжок к пустотной станции Скит. На ее орбите мы проведем ремонтные литургии, а также, при удаче, обменяемся сведениями с находящимися там торговыми кораблями, использующими данный регион как точку рандеву.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-командор, мы зафиксировали благословенное сияние Астрономикона и готовы совершить первый варп-прыжок к планете Скит. На ее орбите мы проведем ремонтные литургии, а также, при удаче, обменяемся сведениями с находящимися на орбите торговыми кораблями, использующими данный регион как точку рандеву.

languages.text: Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} and are ready to make our first warp jump to the Hermitage. Once in the void station's orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other trade voidships there that are using that region as a rendezvous point.
languages.original_text: Лорд-командор, мы зафиксировали благословенное сияние {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Астрономикона{/g} и готовы совершить первый варп-прыжок к пустотной станции Скит. На ее орбите мы проведем ремонтные литургии, а также, при удаче, обменяемся сведениями с находящимися там торговыми кораблями, использующими данный регион как точку рандеву.

traits.locale_text: Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the Astronomican and are ready to make our first warp jump to the planet Skit. Once in its orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other orbiting trade vessels that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the Astronomican and are ready to make our first warp jump to the planet Skit. Once in its orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other orbiting trade vessels that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the Astronomican and are ready to make our first warp jump to the planet Skit. Once in its orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other orbiting trade vessels that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} and are ready to make our first warp jump to the Hermitage. Once in the void station's orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other trade voidships there that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} and are ready to make our first warp jump to the Hermitage. Once in the void station's orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other trade voidships there that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

languages.text: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, hemos localizado la bendita luz del {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomicón{/g} y estamos listos para el primer salto de disformidad hasta el Hermitage. Cuando entremos en órbita de la estación del vacío, llevaremos a cabo la liturgia de mantenimiento y, con suerte, intercambiaremos información con otras naves del vacío comerciales que usan la región como punto de encuentro.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} and are ready to make our first warp jump to the Hermitage. Once in the void station's orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other trade voidships there that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

traits.locale_text: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, hemos localizado la bendita luz del {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomicón{/g} y estamos listos para el primer salto de disformidad hasta el Hermitage. Cuando entremos en órbita de la estación del vacío, llevaremos a cabo la liturgia de mantenimiento y, con suerte, intercambiaremos información con otras naves del vacío comerciales que usan la región como punto de encuentro.

languages.text: 舰长大人，我们已经锁定来来自{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星炬{/g}的祝福之光，准备进行第一次亚空间跳跃，前往隐士庐。等进入虚空站轨道后，我们会开始颂唱。如果幸运的话，说不定还能与在当地汇合的其他虚空贸易舰交换信息。
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} and are ready to make our first warp jump to the Hermitage. Once in the void station's orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other trade voidships there that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人，我们已经锁定来来自{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星炬{/g}的祝福之光，准备进行第一次亚空间跳跃，前往隐士庐。等进入虚空站轨道后，我们会开始颂唱。如果幸运的话，说不定还能与在当地汇合的的其他虚空贸易舰交换信息。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテン、{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星辰波{/g}の祝福された光を捉え、エルミタージュへの最初のワープジャンプの準備が整いました。ヴォイドステーションの軌道に到達しましたら、整備の典礼を行い、運が良ければ、その地域を合流場所に利用している、他の交易ヴォイドシップと情報交換を行う予定です。
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} and are ready to make our first warp jump to the Hermitage. Once in the void station's orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other trade voidships there that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテン、{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星辰波{/g}の祝福された光を捉え、エルミタージュへの最初のワープジャンプの準備が整いました。ヴォイドステーションの軌道に到達しましたら、整備の典礼を行い、運が良ければ、その地域を合流場所に利用している、他の交易ヴォイドシップと情報交換を行う予定です。

languages.text: Lord Captain, wir haben das gesegnete Licht der {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} erfasst und sind bereit, unseren ersten Warpsprung zur Hermitage zu machen. Im Orbit der Station werden wir Wartungsarbeiten durchführen und mit etwas Glück Informationen mit anderen Handelsschiffen austauschen, die diese Region als Rendezvouspunkt nutzen.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} and are ready to make our first warp jump to the Hermitage. Once in the void station's orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other trade voidships there that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

languages.text: {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous sommes parés à effectuer notre premier saut Warp vers l'Ermitage, guidés par la lumière bénie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g}. Une fois en orbite autour de la station du vide, nous procéderons aux liturgies de maintenance et, avec un peu de chance, pourrons échanger quelques informations avec les autres vaisseaux marchands qui utilisent cette région comme point de ralliement.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} and are ready to make our first warp jump to the Hermitage. Once in the void station's orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other trade voidships there that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous sommes parés à effectuer notre premier saut Warp vers l'Ermitage, guidés par la lumière bénie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g}. Une fois en orbite autour de la station du vide, nous procéderons aux liturgies de maintenance et, avec un peu de chance, pourrons échanger quelques informations avec les autres vaisseaux marchands qui utilisent cette région comme point de ralliement.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomikan'ın{/g} kutsanmış ışığına kilitlendik ve İnzivagâh'a doğru ilk öte sıçramamızı yapmaya hazırız. Uçsuz istasyonunun yörüngesine girdiğimizde bakım ayini yapacak ve şansımız yaver giderse bölgeyi bir buluşma noktası olarak kullanan diğer ticari uçsuz gemileriyle bilgi alışverişinde bulunabileceğiz.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we have locked onto the blessed light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} and are ready to make our first warp jump to the Hermitage. Once in the void station's orbit, we will carry out maintenance liturgies and, with luck, exchange information with other trade voidships there that are using that region as a rendezvous point.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomikan{/g}'ın kutsanmış ışığına kilitlendik ve İnzivagâh'a doğru ilk öte sıçramamızı yapmaya hazırız. Uçsuz istasyonunun yörüngesine girdiğimizde onarım ayini yapacak ve şansımız yaver giderse bölgeyi bir buluşma noktası olarak kullanan diğer ticari uçsuz gemileriyle bilgi alışverişinde bulunabileceğiz.
